name: Finkelstein & Partners
description: Personal Injury New York Law Firm
overview:
Finkelstein & Partners, LLP represents plaintiffs in all types of personal injury claims, which might involve single vehicle wrecks, traffic collisions, accidents in the work place, slip and fall injuries and more.

Founded in 1959 by Howard S. Finkelstein, Finkelstein & Partners has grown from one office in Newburgh, NY to multiple offices in New York and New Jersey, with a staff of more than 30 attorneys and 50 of counsel attorneys.

If you have recently been involved in an accident and would like the unparalleled, and proven, legal experience of Finkelstein & Partners behind you, please contact us today.
